name: HH_EPSD_DME_HX
description: This table contains audit history for durable medical equipment (DMEs).

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HSPC_NONCVRD_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: Auditing history of the not-covered reasons for the DME.

columns.name: DME_TYPE_HX_NAME
columns.description: Auditing history of the DME type.

columns.name: START_DATE
columns.description: Auditing history of the start of use dates for the DME.

columns.name: END_DATE
columns.description: Auditing history of the end of use dates for the DME.

columns.name: DME_COMMENTS_HX
columns.description: Auditing history for the comments left about the DME.

columns.name: DME_DELETED
columns.description: Auditing history for whether the DME record is deleted.

columns.name: EDIT_USER
columns.description: Auditing history for whether the DME record is deleted.

columns.name: EDIT_DTTM
columns.description: Auditing history of the instant at which edits were made to data about the DME.

columns.name: EDIT_LINE
columns.description: Auditing history about which DME entry was edited. This is the line number found in column LINE of HH_EPSD_DME.

columns.name: HSPC_COVERED_C_NAME
columns.description: Auditing history about the hospice coverage of the DME.
